description: Evaluates code and app descriptions for privacy policy compliance, data collection practices, ATT framework usage, third-party SDK data sharing, and GDPR/CCPA alignment per Apple guidelines

violations.title: Missing ATT Framework Implementation
violations.description: App collects IDFA without implementing App Tracking Transparency framework
violations.suggested_fix: Import AppTrackingTransparency and call ATTrackingManager.requestTrackingAuthorization before accessing IDFA

example_response.summary: 1 high severity privacy violation found related to ATT framework
